WRITING.TEXT: I appreciate you taking the time to write. She knows I wouldn't do anything with her friends. I think it's more that she was really open with her friends (which she usually isn't) and it backfired. So she's even more closed off now and feels super insecure and judged. Most of her friends are trying to make her feel better about it all, but the few that she used to trust have ruined it. I personally talked to each of the ones that were being forward with me and made it clear how I felt and whatnot. One of them even went so far as to feel my crotch while we were talking and beg to see it. Needless to say, she was a quick 'unfriend' on Facebook.

WRITING.TITLE: Girlfriend told her friends that I'm hung... now our relationship is suffering.
WRITING.TEXT:
My girlfriend told all her friends how well-endowed I am, and now several of them are being creepy, hitting on me, and doing other things which are hurting our relationship. She's usually very shy, hadn't been with another man before me, and told them during a friend's bachelorette party not thinking my size was that big of a deal. Some sort of bacherlorette-based Truth or Dare game.
She's really embarrassed now and thinks she's ruined the relationship with me and with her friends and questions her friendship with the girls that have been forward with me. (I continue to tell her that she did nothing wrong and that the friends that are hitting on me cannot be her close friends if they continue to do this. You cannot be friends with those you don't trust.) I can tell it's really affecting her view of our relationship.
Any suggestions on how to reassure her? She's convinced she's ruined everything and feels really uncomfortable around her friends and doesn't always enjoy being affectionate with me anymore.
Edited for clarity.
**Edited a second time to underscore to all those who are pm-ing me asking me how big I am... how pathetic your attempts are.**

WRITING.TITLE: What do you fantasize about but cannot/will not/should not ever try? (NSFW)
WRITING.TEXT: Triplet women in space. That one seems unlikely.

WRITING.TITLE: Who do you wish was still alive?
WRITING.TEXT:
Bambi's mom.
(Not sure where the 'm' in whom went... I wish it was still alive.)

WRITING.TITLE: What is the most depressing fact you know of?
WRITING.TEXT:
During famines in North Korea, starving Koreans would dig up dead bodies and eat them.
Edit: Supposedly...

WRITING.TITLE: You wake up in a locked room with nothing but a loaded gun and are forced to listen to the same song repeated for 72 hours. Which song would most likely cause you to end your life?
WRITING.TEXT:
[Spin Doctors - Two Princes](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wsdy_rct6uo). The Horror.
(and yes, you'd be provided with water and food to survive)

WRITING.TITLE: Which fake products do you wish were real?
WRITING.TEXT: I want to play [all the random, ingenious video games](http://www.complex.com/video-games/2011/06/simpsons-video-game-history/) that appear in The Simpsons.

WRITING.TITLE: Which film deserves a sequel? (and for bonus points... formulate its plot!)
WRITING.TEXT: Sneakers deserves a sequel.... no bonus points for me.

WRITING.TITLE: Never have I ever peed in the shower. What haven't you done that pretty much everyone else does or has done?
Next time you listen to Bon Iver's "Holocene" or The Who's "I Can See For Miles".... You'll picture this.
Please give a royal hello to Lavender Lemonade. It's the Cristal of Purple Drank.
Which activity do others think you excel at, but in reality you're rather lousy at?
WRITING.TEXT: For me it's not ending question in prepositions.
Um... Hello drug-crazed Trey Parker at [1:43:02](http://youtu.be/7ezeYJUz-84?t=1h43m2s)?

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone else notice how the end of "Shake it Out" by Florence + The Machine is essentially lifted from the the end of Neil Diamond's "America"?
TIL the same actor who played one of the effeminate, armoire stealing 'street toughs' in Seinfeld's "The Soup Nazi" was also Jambi on Pee Wee's Playhouse.
